name: avalynx-datatable
title: AvalynxDataTable
description: AvalynxDataTable is a simple, lightweight, and customizable datatable for the web. Based on Bootstrap >=5.3 without any framework dependencies.

author.name: Juergen Schwind an the Avalynx-DataTable Team

scripts.build: shx rm -rf dist; shx mkdir -p dist/js/; shx cp src/js/avalynx-datatable.js dist/js/avalynx-datatable.js; shx cp src/js/avalynx-datatable.js dist/js/avalynx-datatable.esm.js; node build.js dist/js/avalynx-datatable.esm.js; shx mkdir -p dist/css/; shx cp src/css/avalynx-datatable.css dist/css/avalynx-datatable.css
